metadata.dc:author: Fierros Hernández, Arturo
metadata.dc:description: This paper is a brief history of public health. I review the concept of public health and its origins in the West, and also analyze the input of politics in the Mexican health system through the government of Porfirio Diaz.
metadata.dc:title: Concepto e historia de la salud pública en México (siglos XVIII a XX).
[Concept and history of public health in Mexico (XVIII to XX century)].
